Text: Citizens are terrified of being shot while grocery shopping or attending church. Parents worry about raising children who won’t be able to breathe clean air or drink clean water.
After recent Court decisions, women live in fear of getting pregnant & dying because they can’t receive medical care.
This Court repeatedly & cavalierly upends settled law to rip away cherished & long-held constitutional rights & freedoms.

Failure to address these problems, coupled w/extremist, activist opinions, will lead to continued declines in the Court’s credibility. Congress must pass financial disclosure requirements for SCOTUS & help prevent conflicts of interest that he ignores. There’s bipartisan support.

The Chief Justice’s “hear no evil, see no evil” Annual Report is a huge missed opportunity—ducking key institutional problems at SCOTUS like glaring conflicts of interest, leaked draft opinions, & inappropriate speeches. https://t.co/nMAQBpAgeD
A wonderful #NewYear to all! As we ring in 2023, I’m more grateful than ever to serve the people of CT & fight for a better, healthier, safer tomorrow.

A well-deserved honor for Michael Raucci. Thanks to his—& his U.S. Air Force flight crew’s—bravery, quick action was taken to evacuate survivors after the Hamid Karzai Airport suicide bombing. A true hero. https://t.co/1ANZenn7g1
This investment marks another highly significant step toward bringing our infrastructure into the 21st century & we will continue working for more progress.

This massive, historic investment in an iconic CT structure will make travel safer, speedier, & more reliable. The competition for funding was cutthroat, & our delegations fight for it was steadfast & unstinting. https://t.co/L5VdRyRnlx

Big Oil’s doubling & quadrupling profits should prompt windfall profits penalties early this Congress. I’m hoping for Administration support. Profiteering by energy companies is insanely unfair—insult & injury to consumers & small businesses, rippling costs economy-wide.

Congress should muster the same backbone as European countries—standing up to Big Oil & energy companies with windfall profit penalties & other pro-consumer measures. The legislation I’ve championed would also provide rebates—money back in your pocket.

I’ll work to assure immediate attention & favorable consideration of Sikorsky’s challenge. Our nation deserves the best helicopters & Sikorsky’s world class work force can make them. 
https://t.co/OqsaA1fbdy
Monopolistic power concentrated in too few companies allows airlines’ overcharging, & underperformance.

Congressional hearings & action on Southwest’s catastrophe should be broader than one airline. An entire industry lacking any real competition enabled Southwest to rely on antiquated, vulnerable systems.

Let’s see whether Southwest’s Board is capable of real governance—accountability for C-suite executives, order no cost switching to competitors’ flights, full compensation for expenses, & revamp all systems. 
https://t.co/YgfqL8kloD
Matthias Wirtz is a true hero—selflessly sacrificing to keep our community safe. My heart is with his loved ones during this deeply difficult time. https://t.co/VQ1hPhb2gd

The historic storm was an act of nature, but consumers deserve major remedies for acts of massive mismanagement—air travel malpractice. Southwest must allow customers to switch to other airlines—& provide refunds right away. https://t.co/LQJqStaN4r
Warmest wishes on this bright & joyful holiday. May the gifts of love & peace be yours during this wondrous Christmas season.

A warm, heartfelt thanks to the hearty crews out on this frigid day repairing Eversource & UI power lines around CT. You’re a holiday blessing for our state. Stay safe!
https://t.co/XdwmRm2Hw6

This Omnibus bill is a historic investment to keep America strong & safe. We are fulfilling promises to CT veterans, families, & workers to meet strategic challenges. This package is a huge victory for our state & America. https://t.co/5Gi9koTlZf

The massive new Columbia subs are a stealthy giant of American defense—key to deterring dictatorial aggressors like Putin & assuring allies that our nuclear shield will protect them. CT should be proud of the world’s greatest workforce making them here. https://t.co/FfFhPKxP6v

Congratulations Bob on this well-deserved recognition. Naming a future oceanic survey ship the USNS Robert Ballard is a rightful honor for America’s premier oceanographer. Your steadfast commitment to education & exploration is truly inspiring. https://t.co/Dp13ldOoXc
Along with critical support for our allies in Ukraine, this comprehensive legislation will help our state address the challenges of tomorrow. https://t.co/pkJ9hOAjv5

I’m especially proud to have fought for measures that will address our veteran mental health crisis, support survivors of domestic violence, & improve reporting of hate crimes with double the funding for Jabara-Heyer NO HATE Act grants.

This Omnibus package will make a real difference for people across CT. Historic investments will strengthen our skilled workforce, help families with food, housing, & energy costs, modernize our aging infrastructure, & ensure vets exposed to toxins receive health care & benefits.

President Zelenskyy is the Judah Maccabee of our time. Watching this fierce, brave warrior speak to Congress, I saw him leading a nation—outnumbered, outarmed—to victory against an evil tyrant threatening the world. Putin is today’s Antiochus.

Our Afghan allies risked their lives for our country & deserve permanent status here. A failure to do so would be a stain on our national honor. Great nations keep their promises. That is what the Afghan Adjustment Act would enable us to do. https://t.co/Vq7qRUzWsd
As President Zelenskyy said so eloquently, Putin must be stoped now, or he will seek to conquer other countries. Our own defense is at stake.
Unfurling Ukraine’s flag brought from the battlefield was a striking symbol of our unshakable bonds.
In his voice & face were the people of Ukraine in all their suffering & strength. Their courage & heroism, that I have seen during my visits, has both grit & grace.

An electric moment—a call to arms & to conscience bringing standing ovations & tears. President Zelenskyy’s presence was gigantic. He gave a stirring appeal to American values of freedom & democracy that touched both minds & hearts.
Wonderful visit with the Y’s Men of Westport last Friday. Razor sharp questions about our democracy, & CT’s promising future. https://t.co/eez6Ixm9G9

The nation tonight will see what so deeply inspired us during bipartisan meetings this year—incomparable courage & conviction, an unshakable determination to fight Putin’s savage genocidal onslaught, no matter what it takes. America must help provide what it takes.

During our last visit to Ukraine, Senator Graham & I urged Zelenskyy to address Congress & counter any “Ukraine fatigue” or opposition. He’ll galvanize bipartisan support for military & humanitarian aid, so necessary now.
After visiting & meeting with President @ZelenskyyUa twice this year, I’m beyond excited to hear his heroically exhilarating speech to Congress tonight. He’s a larger than life leader.

Make no mistake: I am steadfastly committed to continuing the fight for reforms, keeping kids safe online & ensuring marketplace fairness. Next Congress you can bet that I will be reintroducing these bills & redoubling the work with my partners. 13
This plague will persist until Congress enforces accountability & cares more about kids than Big Tech. Young people are desperate. 12/ https://t.co/tSPo3Jc7Wg
Big Tech similarly sabotaged antitrust efforts that I led with @SenAmyKlobuchar, @RepCicilline, & @MarshaBlackburn. Our Open App Markets Act received a 20-2 Committee vote. 11/
Big Tech fueled a deluge of astroturfing & lobbying—millions of dollars spent on misinformation defending corporate greed. 10/
But Big Tech’s behemoth sway stymied our efforts. With armies of lobbyists & vast troves of smear money, they flooded the field with misinformation & played both sides. 9/
KOSA always had @SenSchumer’s support & thanks to @SenatorCantwell’s leadership, change was at our fingertips. 8/

@SenSchumer & @SenatorCantwell courageously had our back during the battle, as well as my close friend @SenMarkey  & his important push to update our children’s privacy law COPPA. All steadfast allies fighting for the public interest. 7/

On our side were parents who have suffered the worst loss imaginable & turned that pain into powerful advocacy. One parent told me, “How many more children have to die before we make them a priority? Now is the time. Let’s do it. Let’s pass it.” 6/

In our Subcommittee, @MarshaBlackburn & I held bipartisan hearings about protecting kids online with experts, whistleblowers, & Big Tech executives. The legislation we drafted in response, KOSA, received a unanimous Committee vote—no one would oppose us on the record. 5/
Young people, grieving parents, & fierce advocates & thought leaders have powerfully raised the alarm—bearing witness to the deep wounds & lasting scars. 4/ https://t.co/JtlvvNjxJT

People know the tech platforms they use are broken, toxic, & treacherous. Leaving them frustrated & teetering at the edge of dark rabbit holes—often careening into the abyss & destroying young lives. 3/

The Kids Online Safety Act is the culmination of months of hearings, collaboration with stakeholders, & powerful advocacy from parents & young people. These reforms are thoughtfully crafted & measured, with overwhelming support. 2/
THREAD: I am deeply disappointed & frustrated that Congress is poised to end the year without passing the Kids Online Safety Act & the Open App Markets Act. 1/
No one is above the law. Accountability is key to public trust. These principles are elemental, no matter who or how high the position. https://t.co/Pxp8yAfUTs

I’ll continue to fight to bring DOD's vast medical resources to help wounded Ukrainian fighters, including those who need prosthetics. Having met them here & in Ukraine, I’m moved by their courage & perseverance—grit, grace, & gratitude. America has the expertise & resources.
Lighting the Town of Greenwich Menorah! A very Happy Hanukkah to all celebrating this first night! Light triumphs over darkness. https://t.co/ngPWyH0nve
Honored to join Wreaths Across America at the CT State Veterans Cemetery to Remember, Honor, Teach. A moving ceremony—with families from all over CT. https://t.co/p9rY5If70d
Consumers should study carefully any third party electricity contract to make sure it will save money in the long run. Eversource should free consumers who seek better rates.
Eversource & UI should never keep a secret list of hardship customers without notifying them first. They owe them an apology & compensation for any harm. https://t.co/O0A8vVL5DK

After years of work, this $15M grant means the Kinneytown Dam is coming down. It has been a team effort to rejuvenate the Naugatuck Valley & restore a river that is critical to this community. Thanks to @NVCOGct, @SavetheSound, & all the advocates who made this day possible. https://t.co/8ELg93nXgn
I look forward to President Biden’s signature as we continue to address national security challenges at home & abroad.

This NDAA will bolster CT’s workforce&ensure our state is at the forefront of defense manufacturing. I’m proud to have fought for measures to strengthen CT’s economy, aid Ukrainian allies, increase servicemembers’ pay&provide protections to survivors of military sexual assault.

Secretary Carter’s leadership at the Pentagon opened doors to countless women & transgender service members, & his expertise in global affairs prepared our nation to respond to challenges & threats around the world.

Our bipartisan resolution—passed by the Senate—honors Secretary Carter for the incredible impact he had on our armed services & our nation. His selfless service helped build a stronger, safer America. https://t.co/3OjxXAJJk1

It is still searingly vivid; the voices, the faces, the unforgettable moments of the Sandy Hook tragedy. A decade after the heartbreak of that day the survivors & their loved ones have used their courage, strength, & dedication to make change come from unimaginable horror. https://t.co/1rX8ifGgJA

We resolved then, & repeat now, that we will never forget those brave, beautiful lives & always support their loved ones. We promised as well that we would redouble our efforts to honor them with action.

We awake on December 14th with heavy hearts & painful memories of this day 10 years ago. The world changed horribly & lastingly with the shooting at Sandy Hook—leaving us with heartache & grief that remains so real that we can almost touch it.

Thrilled that Collins Aerospace in Windsor Locks has been tapped to develop the next-gen spacesuits for NASA. CT’s aerospace alley—& the fantastic people that work there—continues to lead the nation to infinity & beyond with the latest & greatest technological innovations.

Prevent abuse, protect the public, & make sure that big cats are given the proper care—that’s the goal of my recently passed Big Cat Public Safety Act. These powerful, beautiful predators deserve to live in the wild, not people’s homes or backyard zoos. https://t.co/Mg1sAbex6s
I support these efforts. Additional federal resources should be made available to help. Police & the public deserve them.

Social workers in the Willimantic Police Dept provide key services for domestic violence & other challenges. Many police depts are adding these potentially lifesaving mental health service providers. https://t.co/5rWorpfc8I

Moving vigil yesterday in Milford for Julie Minogue, tragically killed despite desperate pleas for help, should be a call to action. Domestic violence is a scourge that must be fought with stronger laws, more resources,&increased support for survivors, agencies,&law enforcement.

Thank you to all at @Bridges_CT. You're at the tip of the spear in supporting the community’s mental health & addiction recovery. I’m excited to see how this $1M in federal funding will help to modernize your facility & help expand outreach to underserved communities. https://t.co/Zjxv49VxqN
Surrounded by family & friends in Bridgeport, John Tenn turns 100, sharp as a tack, generous & caring. Really grateful to know him & his loved ones. Happy Birthday, John! https://t.co/2adiaf9usx

“Work hard”—that’s the secret to living long, says John Cyrulik, celebrating his 104th birthday today at the Middletown Fire Station, its driveway named in his honor. John is the warmest, nicest guy you’ll ever meet—a WWII vet & 29 year firefighter. Happy Birthday! https://t.co/obOGrQa1ek
It’s a moral imperative—keeping America’s promise to at-risk Afghan allies who put their lives on the line for our troops & partners. Congress must pass the #AfghanAdjustmentAct before year’s end.

Stirring dedication of Norwalk’s Purple Heart Monument today—a patriotic tribute that hopefully others will follow. Thanks to all the veterans & Norwalk leaders who made it possible. https://t.co/5eF3Ioejl4

In Mystic yesterday to see shoreline site of horrendous fire that recently tore through boats & structures. Speaking to owners, Mystic Chamber of Commerce, & others, my hope is that rebuilding will start soon.
Impressive energy & vision among entrepreneurs & leaders attending the Southern CT Black Chamber of Commerce gala last night. They’re job creators & role models!

A beautiful sun filled day on the New Haven harbor shore for the NCNW luncheon today, with spectacular honorees from our great state. They are leading by example—thank you for all you do! https://t.co/fwWQdSBMel

This $1.4 million DOJ grant for the City of Hartford will be a force multiplier for youth violence intervention. Building a system of constructive community partnerships will help connect young people to resources—giving them the tools to thrive on a new path. https://t.co/YsTBwc4Q8c
@aebrennen @livinlikeLARZ @thuhhnasi @zamaan_qureshi Thank you Andrew for your fearless advocacy. Your passion & conviction are exactly what will help get this bill across the finish line.
Brave young people & grieving parents told @MarshaBlackburn & me of social media’s real life destructive impacts. Powerful faces & voices to pass the Kids Online Safety Act. https://t.co/KNMM8SOL5K

Deeply grateful to the March Fourth Coalition doctors who are bringing their life experience, courage, & conviction to the Capitol—calling for an assault weapons ban. Each day communities are torn apart by gun violence. This scourge must stop. https://t.co/T0VZmA6EdP

I stand with airport workers for the pay & working conditions they deserve—joining @SEIU, @SenMarkey, @SenSchumer, @RepChuyGarcia, @EleanorNorton, & @MaryKayHenry. Passing the Good Jobs for #GoodAirports Act is vital to both workers & travelers. https://t.co/KSfdeUv4eS
No one is safe or community immune to the tragedy of gun violence. For the 10th anniversary of Sandy Hook, we gather once again to demand Congress honor victims with action. https://t.co/bKkbvb8kde

Deeply moving vigil last night marking the Sandy Hook tragedy’s 10th anniversary, with powerful remarks by President Biden & Speaker Pelosi—but most beautifully & heartbreaking by brave survivors. Thanks @NewtownAction.
I’m thrilled that, after a groundswell of public & bipartisan support, this bill I’ve long advocated for will become law.

The Big Cat Public Safety Act will end the horrific exploitation of big cats & bolster public safety. These beautiful but powerful predators deserve to live in the wild, not be kept in captivity for people’s entertainment—even as cubs. https://t.co/H6PjHBdLkq

Profoundly moved by today’s Congressional Gold Medal ceremony for the hundreds of brave officers who defended me, my colleagues, & our democracy on January 6th. These heroes deeply deserve Congress’ highest honor for their extraordinary service & sacrifice.

As the gift buying season reaches its height, consumers should beware of fake&false reviews on Amazon—in fact, almost half of all 720M are unreliable, with many involving cash payments, gift vouchers, or other rewards from sellers. Amazon can&must crackdown on deceptive reviews. https://t.co/fsfWYO3uYr

This $500,000 grant for expanded service at Windham No Freeze is lifesaving. It’s more than just shelter, it’s a critical source of support. Thrilled to be with the team today to recognize their hard work & future success. https://t.co/KP7kUqekad

Old Saybrook’s annual Heroes Tree Lighting was again spectacularly beautiful & moving—a community coming together to honor all who have served & sacrificed or are doing so now. A special tribute to Gold Star families.
Great performance from the USMNT on & off the pitch. Young, strong & skilled, can’t wait to see what you accomplish stateside at the next World Cup.

Perfect brisk day for the annual Christopher Martin’s Christmas Run For The Children today in New Haven. My thoughts were with John Bysiewicz, normally in charge, as he recovers from serious injuries. Thanks to all who raced to support NH kids. https://t.co/ISUKkIAhFM

The 50th Pilipino Association Anniversary Celebration honored past Presidents with a stupendous gala in Cromwell. A wonderful community including many immigrants who are enriching our great nation with their tremendous skills, energy, work ethic & dedication to family & America.

Proud to serve as keynote speaker at the Maria Sanchez Awards Banquet led by the CICD Puerto Rican Parade of Greater Hartford, honoring extraordinary leaders&trailblazers. Maria’s amazing legacy lives on in them,&the fight for justice here&for fellow Americans in Puerto Rico.

Despite raw, rainy weather, Milford plunged (into the Sound) to benefit families of the Bristol police heroes killed in October. Thanks to 100’s who attended & the Milford PD for this inspiring support for loved ones of Lt. DeMonte & Sgt Hamzy. https://t.co/BLOlag9gi5

Proud to join friends & public officials honoring Patrick Clyne & his The Castle, Black Rock Restaurant & Pub for generously supporting so many community causes, most recently Sister Mary Ellen Burns of Apostle Immigrant Services.

Stephanie Torres & her family have a new home in Bridgeport thanks to Habitat for Humanity, celebrated today with supporters & friends. A wet, windy day but wonderfully warm with affection. https://t.co/134IUbDg7I

The Respect for Marriage Act—soon to be law—codifies & reinforces the fundamental truth that love is love. I’m proud to stand with CT LGBTQ+ advocates who have been the powerful force behind this historic win for marriage equality. https://t.co/6NsQPF3q3p
She also has an inspiring American immigrant story, distinguished by hard work & perseverance. I am proud to have championed her as a nominee & look forward to her confirmation in the coming weeks.

Maria Kahn’s immense integrity & intellect are reflected in today’s bipartisan approval of her nomination. She has extraordinary experience as a prosecutor, public defender, judge, & justice that will enrich & strengthen the Court of Appeals.

This legislation will aid efforts to fight criminal corporate conduct. Collecting & reporting data on enforcement actions against white-collar criminals are essential to holding wrongdoers accountable, deterring future crimes, & protecting victims.

The Better Online Ticket Sales Act gave the FTC tools to crack down on parasitic online ticket bots—now it needs to use them. 

@MarshaBlackburn & I would like to know what steps the FTC plans to take to ensure consumers have fair ticket access. https://t.co/WtmdTroQTy

Faulty auto parts, defective kids’ toys, & contaminated infant formula are among the many products that have cost lives when kept on the market for too long. Corporations & employees aware that products may cause serious harm have a responsibility to report it.

Corporate actors that knowingly endanger their workers or the public deserve more than a slap on the wrist. @SenBobCasey, @RepMGS, & my Hide No Harm Act will hold accountable corporate executives who prioritize profits over public safety & protect whistleblowers from retaliation. https://t.co/RBD8hwzDkv

This law is important, but should not have been necessary; there is still so much work ahead of us to combat bigotry. But I am relieved & grateful that thousands of loving couples across the country will no longer have to live in fear of this activist Supreme Court’s intolerance.

At this historic moment, the bill guarantees marriage equality for gay & interracial couples—assuring them that their marriage in CT will be accorded full protection & legal standing in every state, regardless of its own laws.
Confronting a real & urgent threat, this measure guarantees the right of all Americans to marry the person they love.
The VA must swiftly implement these health & safety improvements to protect their patients, workers, & health care providers before another needless tragedy occurs.

This investigation's findings are astounding & alarming. The West Haven VA must take immediate action to address management oversight failures & lack of safety training for employees. https://t.co/LfKkq7mgiM
Luke Bronin has stood strong for public health & education during the pandemic’s most severe challenges. His record of courage & wisdom in Hartford should lead to future opportunities for leadership.

.@MayorBronin has been a superbly inspiring & effective leader—bringing vigor & vision to a truly tough job. He has governed with insight & humanity in combining fiscal responsibility with improved services.

Proud to join veteran Conley Monk Jr. & the @YaleVetsClinic to announce a lawsuit against the VA for failing to address longstanding racial disparities in benefits. Any discrimination must be corrected. https://t.co/FsnsQOktDn

Cancer too often is a killer for firefighters. Congress must reauthorize the firefighter cancer registry so researchers & advocates have the data to continue to improve workplace safety & long-term health—helping save the lives of those who help save ours. https://t.co/4A9bO0f16S

The world must confront Russia’s renewed hideous genocidal attack—90 years after Holodomor. Now it again seeks to strangle & starve all Ukraine—savagely cutting off electricity, food, & water. Ukraine will survive & thrive—victorious.
https://t.co/gKc0QmmFlA

Deeply chilling—the heightening & hardening link of guns to protests, & violent threats to politics, is a spiraling peril to our national security & our democracy. We must come together, both parties, to confront & condemn it.
https://t.co/FwnbNKu1OA

John Ronan was a workhorse for justice—with treasured qualities of a magnificent judge, dedicated patriot, & extraordinary human being. He was rightly renowned for his fairness, integrity, & respect for the rule of law. I send deep sympathies to his family.https://t.co/38dGUzwob5

A wonderful #Thanksgiving to all—thankful for cherished family & friends, precious freedoms, & a brightening future. A special thanks to all who keep us safe at home & abroad. We are blessed & grateful to be Americans.
Congrats on the Thanksgiving pardon, Inès. Grateful to @StewLeonards for the reminder to show a little extra kindness this holiday season. Thank you for all that you do. https://t.co/P4EQlcAeDW

My heart breaks—for the loved ones & Chesapeake community, especially at this time of giving thanks & peaceful gatherings. I also grieve for our great nation where it seems no one is immune, no time is spared, no place is safe from the scourge of gun violence.
Recalled products are commonly sold on Facebook Marketplace & eBay—putting kids at serious risk. These sites know better, must do better, or be held accountable.

The holidays should be a time of joy & celebration, but too often it ends up with trips to the ER when kids are hurt by toys. These injuries are preventable. We must provide parents with more safety info & hold companies who sell recalled toys & unsafe products accountable. https://t.co/b35ZBtrKTX

Small businesses are the bedrock of our economy & communities. Fantastic to join a business walking tour in Madison today with local leaders & @SBA_Connecticut. 
Don’t forget to shop locally this Saturday & every day. https://t.co/C8RT6veeEy

If DOJ’s investigation reveals that Live Nation has continued to abuse its dominant market position, the Department must consider unwinding the merger & breaking up the company. This may be the only way to truly restore competition in the ticketing market.

Artists, venues, & concertgoers should no longer be at the mercy of a single seller. DOJ must act to help consumers & the market shake off the effects of this monopoly. @SenMarkey, @SenAmyKlobuchar, & I are calling on DOJ to hold Ticketmaster/Live Nation accountable. https://t.co/WAIQoiZHv1

Vets please take advantage of all the care, benefits, & more under the PACT Act, long overdue redress for victims of toxic chemicals from burn pits & elsewhere. That was my message at the New Haven seminar this weekend organized by the National Veterans Council For Legal Redress.

Burgeoning online sports betting—through undisclosed casino deals—seems like about the worst idea for colleges & students right now. This potentially addictive activity, aimed at young people with slick promotions, is clearly unconscionable. Stop Caesarizing before it spreads.

Congrats & thanks to the Norden Club in Bridgeport for its hugely successful Turkey Drive this weekend, helping the Bridgeport Rescue Mission provide more than 7,000 families with a full Thanksgiving feast. The club combines camaraderie & civic commitment. https://t.co/LdtTUop9PD

Proud to welcome home CT National Guard’s 142nd Medical Co. & 1109 TASMG this weekend from their nearly 1-year deployments in Poland & Kuwait. Thank you for your service & sacrifice in support of Operation Atlantic Resolve, & to your families as well. Truly inspiring.

Thanks to Norwalk’s Cornerstone Community Church for another Thanksgiving Lunch, providing a spectacular chef-prepared dinner with caring & encouragement. An inspiring way to begin this uniquely American holiday. https://t.co/w0OQVtouOt

Stamford’s Downtown Parade Spectacular was a huge hit, drawing big crowds & delighting balloon lovers. Despite the whipping wind, abundant warmth from fans happy to be back for this 29th annual event after a 2 year break. https://t.co/1hiDyI91kL

Delighted to attend yesterday’s Starbucks Solidarity Sip-in in West Hartford, supporting workers fighting for a union, fair pay, & good hours. They deserve effective rights to bargain collectively without management interference. https://t.co/rf8N5ESWVH

Legal immunity for MBS mocks American values. This shield—artificially enabled by his elevation to Prime Minister—obstructs needed accountability. Our government’s acquiescence in this cynical maneuver is unacceptable. https://t.co/KxBV2M1vxk

Horrible & horrific shooting at Club Q in Colorado Springs. My heart breaks for the victims, their loved ones, & the LGBTQ+ community. This hate-fueled, tragic gun violence destroys lives & shakes communities to their core. We must do more to combat this scourge.
Allegations of this unconscionable leak should be investigated, just as the Dobb draft improper disclosure is under inquiry. Accountability is critical.

This stunning, deeply disturbing revelation only further shatters the legitimacy & credibility of the Court. Absolutely no question, Congress should establish a SCOTUS Code of Ethics so justices can't peddle their influence & undermine our legal system. 
https://t.co/qN0KppeoIk
DOJ must enforce the conditions of the Live Nation merger consent decree or unwind this monopoly & break up it.

Swifties: If you’re angry & frustrated (as I am) about Ticketmaster’s monopoly, you have the power to demand action from public officials & federal agencies & to protect fans. We know all too well that what happened last week is not a glitch—change is necessary.

35% of all the food in America is wasted despite millions facing serious food insecurity. Ahead of Thanksgiving, I stopped by @CTFoodshare to talk about my Food Donation Improvement Act, making it easier for restaurants & grocery stores to donate to those in need. https://t.co/lOZxx7pYfD

Rewarding day in Southington with members of CT's Farm Bureau Association. Farming is part of our state's culture, environment, & economy. We need to do all we can to preserve agricultural land & protect family farms. https://t.co/rkXNzGNCH9

No doubt unions work—providing career opportunities & job training for so many Americans while spurring economic growth. Fantastic to join this morning’s CT Building Trades Apprentice celebration for 100 years of union apprenticeship service. https://t.co/IBcpkSPdjR

Ticketmaster’s majority owner says it’s Taylor Swift’s fault for failing to do more shows. Not Ticketmaster’s manipulative fees, price hikes, & black box algorithms. 

No one believes this bunk.

Ticketmaster, with their profiteering, predatory practices, should look in the mirror&say: I’m the problem. It’s me. 

It’s time for DOJ to hold this bully accountable&enforce the terms of the Live Nation merger agreement to protect consumers or to break up this malign monopoly.

Justice Department action is long overdue. Consumers need protection right away. Reports of an ongoing investigation are encouraging, but concertgoers deserve more than just a warm-up act. https://t.co/0tIehC0GzQ

Our thoughts are with the Naugatuck police offer shot during a Waterbury undercover operation. Another reminder of the courage & strength shown every day by countless law enforcement public servants as they work in harm’s way to keep us safe. We owe them gratitude & more.

Thank you, @SpeakerPelosi. I will always be eternally grateful for your strong, steadfast leadership. Through thick & thin you've been a fearless force working to improve Americans’ lives. A profile in courage & commitment to our country, your service will be forever remembered.

Recipients of awards—incoming House Foreign Relations Chairman McCaul as well as Senate Foreign Relations Committee Ranking Member Risch, Senator Portman, & myself—all endorsed providing expanded military & humanitarian assistance to repel Putin’s genocidal invasion.

Last night’s awards ceremony by Ukrainian National Information Service showed dramatically that support for scaled up, robust aid to Ukraine continues strong&bipartisan in this Congress. A consistent theme: aid for the fiercely brave Ukrainians is vital to our national security. https://t.co/6FNjuZNL45

Consumers deserve more options, better prices, & fewer barriers to the music & artists we know & love. DOJ would've, could've, should've done (& still can do) so much more to investigate the state of competition in the live entertainment/ticketing industry.https://t.co/aMYXtnqwvr

Ticketmaster—I knew you were trouble way back in 2009 when I asked questions about your ticketing practices as AG. Long story short, your anti-competitive behavior has been no love story for Taylor Swift concertgoers. https://t.co/Be9Q1u3NSB

The terrifying truth is that the attacks on reproductive freedom extend to birth control. 

People deserve the agency contraception gives them over their bodies, lives, & futures. I’ll keep fighting to protect the right to affordable, accessible birth control. #ThnxBirthControl

The threat to marriage equality is real & urgent. Americans in same-sex & interracial marriages deserve to know that their marriage is—& will always be—recognized. 

I will be voting YES on the #RespectForMarriageAct to protect loving couples’ rights & freedoms.

Thank you to the parents who shared their powerful, harrowing stories. You are right, inaction is unacceptable.
